column1: CRUD functions (using a user with appropriate permissions that is not user 1)
Create annotation in Sea Dragon Viewer (configurable for large images & pages)
column2: A user that is not user1 creates an annotation on an image.
column3: Annotation is created.  RELS-EXT, DS-COMPOSITE-MODEL, DC, WADM and WADM_SEARCH datastreams all exist and can be viewed in fedora or as datastreams. Annotation appears in screen and is numbered. Automatic block below updates with the content of the annotation.

column1: Load (view) annotation in Sea Dragon Viewer (configurable for large images & pages)
column2: A user that is not user1 clicks the load button and rolls cursor over annotation.
column3: The annotation appears. Popup on mouseover. Appears in the block.

column1: Create/Add another annotation in Sea Dragon Viewer (configurable for large images & pages)
column2: A user that is not user1 creats an additional annotation on an image.
column3: Annotation is created.  RELS-EXT, DS-COMPOSITE-MODEL, DC, WADM and WADM_SEARCH datastreams all exist and can be viewed in fedora or as datastreams. Annotation appears in screen and is numbered. Automatic block below updates with the content of the annotation.

column1: Edit own web annotation in Sea Dragon Viewer (configurable for large images & pages)
column2: A user with permissions to edit own annotation selects the pencil tool.
column3: The popup becomes editable and text can be added. The save button can be selected, and the text appears updated on mouseover.

column1: Edit any web annotation in Sea Dragon Viewer (configurable for large images & pages)
column2: A user with permissions to edit any annotation selects the pencil tool.
column3: The popup becomes editable and text can be added. The save button can be selected, and the text appears updated on mouseover.

column1: Delete own web anotation in Sea Dragon Viewer (configurable for large images & pages)
column2: A user with permission to edit their own annotation presses the x button.
column3: The annotation is deleted and a confirmation message appears.

column1: Delete any web annotation in Sea Dragon Viewer (configurable for large images & pages)
column2: A user with permission to delete any annotation presses the x button.
column3: The annotation is deleted and a confirmation message appears.

column1: Testing the Permissions provided by the module
A user can only view
column2: View:On Create:Off Edit any:Off Delete any:Off Edit own:Off Delete own:Off -> After creating one or more annotations, assign a user the permission to only be able to view annotations. Masquerade as this user and visit the relevant object.
column3: A user with only permission to view will be able to load and view annotations, but will not be able to edit or delete them.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass Video: pass ,Oral history: pass, Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can only create
column2: View:Off Create:On Edit any:Off Delete any:Off Edit own:Off Delete own:Off -> Assign a user only the permission to 'create annotations. Masquerade as this user and navigate to an object.
column3: A user with only the permission to create will only have the create button and not the load button. Created anotations will disappear immediately.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass,Video: pass,Oral history: pass , Page: pass Condition:Need to hide web annotation solr view block, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view or create annotations only
column2: View:On Create:On Edit any:Off Delete any:Off Edit own:Off Delete own:Off -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object. Assign a user only the permission to View and Create annotations. Masquerade as this user, load, view, and create annotations.
column3: A user with permissions to View and Create annotations should be able ot load, view and create annotations, but not be able to edit or delete their own, or those created by others.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view and edit any annotation
column2: View:On Create:Off Editany:On Deleteany:Off Editown:Off Deleteown:Off -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object. Assign a user only the permission to View and Edit annotations. Masquerade as this user, load, view, and edit annotations.
column3: A user with permission to load, view and edit annotations should be able to view and edit annotations, but not create or delete annotations.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view and delete any annotation, but cannot edit
column2: View:On Create:Off Editany:Off Deleteany:On Editown:Off Deleteown:Off -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object. Assign a user only the permissions to View or Delete annotations. Masquerade as the user, load, view and delete annotations.
column3: A user with permissions to View or Delete annotations should be able to load, view and delete annotations, but not create or edit any annotations.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view, create, and edit any annotation but cannot delete
column2: View:On Create:On Editany:On Deleteany:Off Editown:Off Deleteown:Off -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object. Assign a user only the permissions to View, Create, or Edit any annotations. Masquerade as the user, load, create, and edit the user annotations and pre-existing annotations.
column3: A user with permissions to View or Create or Edit any annotations should be able to load, add and view any annotations, but not delete them.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view and create annotations and can delete them, but cannot edit them.
column2: View:On Create:On Editany:Off Deleteany:On Editown:Off Deleteown:Off -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object. Assign a user only the permissions to View, Create, or Delete any annotations. Masquerade as the user, load, create, view and delete the user annotations and pre-existing annotations.
column3: A user with the permission to View, Create or Delete any anotations should be able to view, load, create or delete their own annotations and the annotations of others, but they should not be able to edit any annotations.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view and create annotations, and can edit their own.
column2: View:On Create:On Editany:Off Deleteany:Off Editown:On Deleteown:Off -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object. Assign a user only the permissions to View, Create, or Edit their own annotations. Masquerade as the user, load, view, create and edit the user's annotations. Try editing the annotations created by other users.
column3: A user with the permission to View, Create or Edit their own annotations should be able to load, view, and create annotations, but only edit their own annotations and not the annotations of others.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view and create annotations and delete their own, but not edit any.
column2: View:On Create:On Editany:Off Deleteany:Off Editown:Off Deleteown:On -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object. Assign a user only the permissions to View, Create and Delete own annotations. Masqureade as the user, load, add and delete annotations. Try to delete the annotations of others.
column3: A user with the permission to View, Create, and Delete their own annotations should be able to load, view, and create annotations, but not be able to edit any annotations, and only be able to delete their own annotations.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view annotations, edit any and delete any. They cannot create annotations.
column2: View:On Create:Off Editany:On Deleteany:On Editown:Off Deleteown:Off -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object. Assign a user only the permissions To view, edit any annotations and delete any annotations. Masqureade as the user. Load, view, edit and delete annotations.
column3: A user with the permission to View, edit and delete any annotations should be able to edit and delete any annotations, but not be able to create or edit annotations.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view, edit annotations, and delete their own annotations. They cannot create, delete any annotation.
column2: View:On Create:Off Editany:On Deleteany:Off Editown:Off Deleteown:On -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object, including an annotation authored by a user who previously had the permission assigned to create an annotation and did so. Revoke permissions for this user so they only have the permissiont o view, edit any annotation, and delete their own annotation. Masquerade as the user.  Navigate to the object where the user had previously authored an annotation. Load, View, edit annotations, and attempt to delete the annotation the user previously created when they had the create permission.
column3: A user with the permission to View, edit any annotation ,and delete their own annotation should be able to load, edit any annotation, but only delete annotations that their user has created in the past.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view, delete any and edit their own annotations. They cannot create, edit any annotations.
column2: View:On Create:Off Editany:Off Deleteany:On Editown:On Deleteown:Off -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object, including an annotation authored by a user who previously had the permission assigned to create an annotation and did so. Revoke permissions for this user so they only have the permission to view, delete any annotation, and edit their own annotation. Masquerade as the user. Navigate to the object where the user had previously authored an annotation. Load, View, and delete annotations, and attempt to edit the annotation the user previously created when they had the create permission.
column3: A user with the permission to View, delete any annotation ,and edit their own annotation should be able to load, delete any annotation, but only edit annotations that their user has created in the past.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view, edit their own and delete their own annotations.
column2: View:On Create:Off Editany:Off Deleteany:Off Editown:On Deleteown:On -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object, including an annotation authored by a user who previously had the permission assigned to create an annotation and did so. Revoke permissions for this user so they only have the permission to View, Edit own and delete own annotations. Masquerade as the user. Navigate to the object where the user had previously authored an annotation. Load, View, Edit and delete the annotations previously created by this user.
column3: A user with the permission to View and edit annotations they have created should be able to view, load, and edit/delete only annotations that their user has created in the past.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view, create, edit and delete any annotation
column2: View:On Create:On Editany:On Deleteany:On Editown:Off Deleteown:Off -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object. Assign a user permissions to View, Create, Edit any and Delete any annotations. Masquerade as the user. Navigate to an object with pre-existing annotations. Load, View, Edit, Add, and delete annotations.
column3: A user with permissions to view, create, edit and delete all annotations should encounter no restrictions on these activities.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view, create and edit any annotation, and cannot delete any annotations.
column2: View:On Create:On Editany:On Deleteany:Off Editown:On Deleteown:Off -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object. Assign a user permissions to View, Create, and Edit any annotations. Masquerade as the user. Navigate to an object with pre-existing annotations. Load, View, Edit, Add, and attempt to delete annotations.
column3: A user with permissions to view, create, and edit all annotations should encounter no restrictions on these activities. This user should not be able to delete any annotations.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view, create, ad edit any annotation, and can only delete ones they have created.
column2: View:On Create:On Editany:On Deleteany:Off Editown:Off Deleteown:On -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object. Assign a user permissions to View, Create, and Edit any annotations, and to delete own annotations Masquerade as the user. Navigate to an object with pre-existing annotations. Load, View, Edit, Add, and attempt to delete annotations.
column3: A user with permissions to View, Create, Edit any annotations and delete own annotations should be able to do everything but delete annotations they did not create.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view and create annotations, can delete any annotations, but only edit their own.
column2: View:On Create:On Editany:Off Deleteany:On Editown:On Deleteown:Off -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object. Assign a user permissions to View, Create, and Delete any, and Edit own annotations. Navigate to an object with pre-existing annotations. Load, View, Add, Delete and Edit own annotations
column3: A user with permissions to View, Create, Delete any and Edit own annotations should be able to View and Create annotations, delete any annotations, but only edit their own annotations (not the annotations of others)
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view and create annotations, but only delete and edit their own.
column2: View:On Create:On Editany:Off Deleteany:Off Editown:On Deleteown:On -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object. Assign a user permissions to View, Create, and Delete and Edit own annotations. Masquerade as that user and navigate to an object with known annotations. Load, View, Add, Edit, and Delete annotations. Attempt to Edit and Delete annotations created by other users.
column3: A user with permissions to View, Create and Delete and Edit own annotations should not be able to edit and delete annotations created by others.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view annotations, edit or delete any annotation, but not create.
column2: View:On Create:Off Editany:On Deleteany:On Editown:On Deleteown:Off -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object, including annotations previously created by the user. Revoke user’s permission so they can only View, Edit any, Delete any, and Edit own annotations. Masquerade as that user and navigate to an object with known annotations, some having been created by the user. Load, View, Add, Edit, and Delete annotations.
column3: A user with permissions to View, Delete any and Edit own annotations should not be able to edit annotations created by other users or create annotations.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view annotations, edit any annotations, but only delete their own annotations
column2: View:On Create:Off Editany:On Deleteany:Off Editown:On Deleteown:On -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object, including annotations previously created by the user. Revoke user’s permission so they can only View, Edit any, Edit own and Delete own annotations. Masquerade as the user and navigate to an object where the user created annotations previously. Load, View, Edit annotations and attempt to delete annotations previously created by this user as well as annotations created by other users.
column3: A user with permissions to View, Edit any, Edit own and Delete own annotations should be able to View and Edit any annotations, but only be able to delete annotations they created previously.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can view annotation, can delete any annotations, but can only edit annotations they have created.
column2: View:On Create:Off Editany:Off Deleteany:On Editown:On Deleteown:On -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object, including annotations previously created by the user. Revoke user’s permission so they can only View, Delete any, Edit own, and Delete own annotations. Masquerade as the user and navigate to an object where the user created annotations previously. Load, View, and delete annotations. Edit annotations created previously. Attempt to edit annotations created by others.
column3: A user with permissions to View, Delete any, Edit own, and Delete own annotations should be able to View and Delete any annotation, but only edit annotations they have created previously.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can create and edit their own and others
column2: View:On Create:On Editany:On Deleteany:On Editown:On Deleteown:On -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object, including annotations previously created by the user. Give user all permissions. Masquerade as the user and navigate to the object with annotations. Load, Create, Edit, and Delete all annotations.
column3: A user with all permissions activated should be able to load, create, edit and delete any annotation.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: A user can't view or create or edit or delete annotations
column2: View:Off Create:Off Editany:Off Deleteany:Off Editown:Off Deleteown:Off -> Ensure that several annotations already exist for an object. Ensure a user is assigned to a role with no annotation permissions and have them navigate to an object with known annotations.
column3: A user with no permissions activated should be able to view the Islandora object, but no annotations or buttons associated with annotation.
column4: Large image: pass, Basic Image: pass, Video: pass ,Oral history: pass , Page: pass, Audio:pass

column1: Configuration Testing
Toggle on and off Verbose Alert Messages
column2: Navigate to settings and turn on and off verbose alert messages. Travel back to objects and attempt to create annotations.
column3: When Verbose is on, the JSON being created should be visible in the confirmation screen.

column1: Toggle on and off Hide Default Annotation List Block
column2: Navigate to settings and turn off and on the "Hide Default Annotation List Block"
column3: When "Hide Default Annotation List Block" is off, the default annotation list block should not be visible. It should come back when this option is toggled on.

column1: Toggle on and off Load annotations by default for basic and large images.
column2: Navigate to settings and turn off and on the "Load annotations by default"
column3: When "Load annotations by default" button is on, both simple and large images with annotations should load with their annotations loaded. Toggling off should make this behaviour stop and require the load button.

column1: Toggle on and off Remove clipper for large images.
column2: Navigate to settings and turn on and off the "remove clipper for large images"
column3: When "Remove clipper for large images" is on, the clipper icon should disappear. It shoudl reappear when toggled off.

column1: Change default namespace for annotations
column2: Navigate to settings and turn on and off "default namespace for annotations"
column3: When the default annotation namespace is changed, annotations should be created under a new namespace, from the time that the new namespace is saved.

column1: Edge Cases
